Title: Mithya
Writer: Rajat Kapoor, Saurabh Shukla, Neerav Ghosh (lyrics), Ashish Manchanda (lyrics), Shahid Hamdaane (lyrics), Prakash Chandra Dhamak (lyrics)
Actors: Ranvir Shorey, Neha Dhupia, Naseeruddin Shah, Saurabh Shukla
Plot: A two-bit actor faces challenges after he is asked by Police to impersonate a look-alike gangster.
